sentences.sentence: There are few more sobering online activities than entering data into college-tuition calculators and gasping as the Web spits back a six-figure sum.
sentences.translation: 在大学学费计算器里输入数据，然后对着网络吐出来的六位数倒抽一口气——很少有其他在线活动比这种活动更能让人清醒了。

sentences.sentence: At the end of each race, SWAN spits out data on each swimmer.
sentences.translation: 在每一场比赛结束时，SWAN 都会给出每位游泳选手的数据。

sentences.sentence: When the orderly leaves, Michael spits the pills in his hand.
sentences.translation: 等到勤杂工离开后，Michael把药片吐在手中。
